.. py:data:: INVENTOR_DATA_MODULE
   :annotation: = pv_evaluation.data.inventor

   

.. py:function:: load_unique_id_series(module, filename)

   Load disambiguation series from csv file with columns "unique-id" and "mention-id".

   :param module: module where file is located.
   :type module: str
   :param filename: csv filename.
   :type filename: str

   :returns: pandas series named "unique-id" and with "mention-id" as an index.
   :rtype: Series
